Arrived promptly. Product was as described.

I received the video II had ordered for my special needs niece.  Opened it to make sure it was ok before giving it to her and guess what--  no movie all SNOW on the screen.  I contacted Harmons Book store they told me to return it for a refund as they did not have any more videos. I returned it and got an email from them saying I damaged the video.  As UI told them I was the only one who handled it and I am 75 years old and did not damage the video.
My Son loves it, wish it came in DVD format but he watches it over and over and will have to order one soon.

This video shows all different ways to celebrate--Christmas, Kwanzaa, Hanukah.  It also demonstrates ways people can show they care during this festive season.  It deals with the holidays in a positive and constructive manner to demonstrate what the true meaning of this time of year should be.  My daughter loves it!
